subtitle: Morel mushrooms give a wonderful flavour to this pasta recipe. But you could use chestnut mushrooms if you don't have any morels.

method.text: In a bowl, add the garlic and lemon rind to the oil.
Toss the chicken strips in the oil . Cover and set aside.
Chop the mushrooms. Fry in the butter for 2-3 min. Put to one side.
Heat the wine in a pan until reduced by half.
Cook the pasta until al dente for about 4-6 min. Drain well.
Fry the chicken in a hot frying pan for 4-5 min until golden brown.
Add the chicken stock to the wine and bring to the boil. Add the cream. Return to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 min. Remove from heat.
Add the coriander to the stock. Season to taste. Stir the mushrooms, tomato and sauce into the chicken and heat for 2 min.
Add the pasta to the pan with the chicken and sauce. Toss thoroughly to mix well.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.

title: Chicken tagliatelle in creamy morel and coriander sauce
